name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Today, Xinhua News Agency reported that the General Office of the CPC Central Committee and the General Office of the State Council issued a document: firmly oppose and resist the Western "constitutionalism" and "separation of powers" and other erroneous views

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On February 27, a large-scale conflict between police and civilians occurred in Hua County, Anyang, Henan.
It is reported that on the 20th, a 24-year-old local woman was stabbed to death by her husband with eight consecutive knives.
On the night of the 26th, it was suddenly reported that the woman's body was stolen, causing a large number of angry villagers to go to the man's residence to ask for an explanation, which eventually led to a mass incident.
During the incident, police cars were overturned and police used violence to beat villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A video was secretly filmed by a citizen, showing dozens of uniformed personnel taking a man out of a house and beating him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident fermented, angry villagers (some comments also said that some of them were watching the excitement) rushed into the man’s house and smashed things.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the scene of the conflict, someone hung the deceased's portrait and elegiac couplets on the police car

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident, the local Municipal Party Committee Political and Legal Affairs Commission issued a report on the situation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
Some netizens found that they had not used the Xuexi Qiangguo app for half a year and had turned off all permissions. However, its background running time was very frequent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of February 27, a knife murder occurred at Hangzhou Shaw Hospital, and the murderer then jumped off the building to commit suicide

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: NPC deputy Zhu Zhengfu once again calls for the abolition of the crime of provoking disturbances

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: The deceased's family sealed the victim's coffin in the man's home

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that people at the scene mourned the dead in front of the police car

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The deceased's family members made statements at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The latest situation of the incident
According to the video posted by a Douyin user, a large number of police forces are currently heading to Yangbadao Village where the incident occurred to provide reinforcements.
